data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in San Cristóbal, Dominican Republic to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Cristóbal, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in San Cristóbal with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of San Cristóbal, Dominican Republic need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of San Cristóbal, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Japanese people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of San Cristóbal words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of San Cristóbal an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.section_summary:
the state of San Cristóbal, Dominican Republic has a population of 532,900.

We estimate San Cristóbal has 57,762 people who might know Jesus, 442,059 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 33,079 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 57,762 believers in the state of San Cristóbal to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
